title: (x) The Passion movie logo - (similar to) Columna {Mark S}
author: samiam

comments.content: I think this one might have started life as [Columna](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107190317/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/columna/solid/testdrive.html?s=THE%a0PASSION&p=48).
Mark is right. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107190317im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) I was involved in some of this campaign.

Although, not the part where the ruined the letter shapes (allow me to clarify) ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107190317im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Hildebrant.

First thought: TRAJAN.   
   
Second thought: [CRESCI](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107190317/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/cresci/cresci/testdrive.html?s=the%2Bpassion&p=72). But the E has been widened, as has the T and H ... and they've added serifs to the tops of the S.
